Class Cylinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Primitive
      • Cylinder

  • public class Cylinder
extends Primitive
    Cylinder representation. containing geometry data for OpenGL this is a special cylinder used as tube for the game Tempest thus the insides rather than the outsides are rendered, also note the inverted normals direktion
    Author:
    Andreas Berger
